name: ConjureFactory
description: ConjureFactory. Factory contract to create new instances of Conjure.

eventDecorators.name: FactoryOwnerChanged
eventDecorators.description: Event fired when a item is sold.

eventDecorators.name: NewConjure
eventDecorators.description: Event fired when a item is sold.

eventDecorators.name: NewConjureImplementation
eventDecorators.description: Event fired when a item is sold.

eventDecorators.name: NewConjureRouter
eventDecorators.description: Event fired when a item is sold.

eventDecorators.name: NewEtherCollateralImplementation
eventDecorators.description: Event fired when a item is sold.

functionDecorators.name: conjureMint
functionDecorators.description: lets anyone mint a new Conjure contract.

parameterDecorators.name: oracleTypesValuesWeightsDecimals
parameterDecorators.description: array containing the oracle type, oracle value, oracle weight, oracle decimals array.

parameterDecorators.name: callDataArray
parameterDecorators.description: thr callData array for the oracle setup.

parameterDecorators.name: signatures_
parameterDecorators.description: the array containing the signatures if the oracles.

parameterDecorators.name: oracleAddresses_
parameterDecorators.description: the addresses array of the oracles containing 2 addresses: 1. address to call, 2. address of the token for supply if needed.

parameterDecorators.name: divisorAssetTypeMintingFeeRatio
parameterDecorators.description: array containing 2 arrays: 1. divisor + assetType, 2. mintingFee + CRatio.

parameterDecorators.name: conjureAddresses
parameterDecorators.description: containing the 2 conjure needed addresses: owner, ethUsdChainLinkOracle.

parameterDecorators.name: nameSymbol
parameterDecorators.description: array containing the name and the symbol of the asset.

parameterDecorators.name: inverse
parameterDecorators.description: indicator if this an inverse asset.

functionDecorators.name: getConjureRouter
functionDecorators.description: gets the address of the current factory owner.

returnDecorators.description: the address of the conjure router.

functionDecorators.name: newConjureImplementation
functionDecorators.description: lets the owner change the current conjure implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: conjureImplementation_
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the new implementation.

functionDecorators.name: newConjureRouter
functionDecorators.description: lets the owner change the current conjure router.

parameterDecorators.name: conjureRouter_
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the new router.

functionDecorators.name: newEtherCollateralImplementation
functionDecorators.description: lets the owner change the current EtherCollateral implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: etherCollateralImplementation_
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the new implementation.

functionDecorators.name: newFactoryOwner
functionDecorators.description: lets the owner change the ownership to another address.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the new owner.
